problem.markdown:
>>Compare and contrast U and V. <<
[ ]They are one and the same. [ ]They are both vector spaces. [x]One is a space and one is a set. [x]U maps to V via the random variable X [Explanation] X is a mapping from U, the set of all possibilities and V, a vector space (commonly the real number line). [Explanation]

choiceresponse.label: Compare and contrast U and V.

checkboxgroup.choice: They are one and the same.
One is a space and one is a set.
U maps to V via the random variable X

div.p: X is a mapping from U, the set of all possibilities and V, a vector space (commonly the real number line).
